record.short_description: Anonymous, AI-driven ServiceNow platform to report, manage, and prevent workplace harassment and misconduct.
record.description:
Proposal Title: SafeSpace – AI-Powered Workplace Harassment Reporting & Prevention Platform
Summary: SafeSpace is a ServiceNow-based secure platform designed to help employees report workplace harassment and misconduct confidentially. It leverages AI-driven categorization, automated workflows, and analytics to ensure fair, private, and timely resolutions.
Problem: Workplace harassment often goes unreported due to fear of retaliation, stigma, or lack of trusted reporting mechanisms. Organizations struggle to maintain transparency, fairness, and confidentiality in handling such cases.
Solution: SafeSpace empowers employees to report incidents anonymously and enables HR and compliance teams to investigate efficiently while maintaining privacy and data protection.
Key Features: 1. Anonymous Reporting Portal – Employees can submit confidential reports via chatbot, email, or form. 2. AI-Powered Case Categorization – Natural Language Processing (NLP) identifies the type and severity of reports. 3. Secure Escalation Workflow – Routes cases to designated HR or ethics officers with controlled access. 4. Sentiment & Trend Analysis – Detects emerging risk patterns or culture issues. 5. Resource & Support Library – Provides access to legal rights, counseling, and mental health help. 6. Confidential Analytics Dashboard – Visualizes trends without exposing identities.
Target Users: - Corporates and HR Departments - Compliance & Ethics Teams - NGOs focused on employee welfare - Government and public offices
Integrations: - Microsoft Teams / Slack - Twilio / WhatsApp - ServiceNow Predictive Intelligence - External Legal and Counseling APIs
Impact: - Encourages safe and transparent workplaces - Reduces fear of retaliation for victims - Enhances HR efficiency and compliance tracking - Promotes data-driven cultural change
Tech Stack: - ServiceNow App Engine - Flow Designer & IntegrationHub - Virtual Agent + NLP - Predictive Intelligence - Performance Analytics
Estimated Effort (MVP): - 7–9 weeks for reporting, triage, and analytics - +3 weeks for integrations and trend detection
